section.title: Three Control Plane Node Disaster Recovery
section.para: In this scenario, all control plane nodes are destroyed which need to be rebuilt or replaced.

section.title: Restore from a Swift backup:
section.para: Restoring from a Swift backup is not possible because Swift is gone.
